description:
One pair of pants for the ride to the office, the workday, and a little playing on the way home. When you look beyond the Vander’s understated style, you notice subtle technical details that keep you comfy when on the move.

  • Cotton with added nylon for durability and spandex for a comfortable stretch
  • Ribbed panels at the waist give you the option of going belt-less
  • Darts at the knees for enhanced mobility
  • Reflective strips on the roll-up hems keep you seen on your bike
  • Uses Better Cotton Initiative (BCI) cotton. The BCI is a not-for-profit association committed to a holistic approach to sustainable cotton production
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Regular fit wears like and old favourite
name: Kathmandu Vander Pants - Men's
